Code.org - Director of Engineering - Full-time - Seattle WA - Remote - code.org

Code.org is a nonprofit dedicated to expanding access to computer science in K-12 schools and increasing participation by young women and students from other underrepresented groups. Apply here: https://boards.greenhouse.io/codeorg/jobs/4423776005

I am personally hoping we find a leader who values:

  • Individuals and interactions over processes and tools

  • Working software over documenting everything

  • Collaborating day-to-day with product/curriculum over building quarterly spreadsheets with them

  • Responding to change over following a plan
